official_title: A bill to exempt individuals currently employed as United States Department of Energy security inspectors from the physical fitness requirements promulgated by the Department of Energy in chapter IV of United States Department of Energy Order 5632 and from any other physical fitness requirements promulgated by the Department of Energy.

summary.text: Exempts individuals employed on or before the date of enactment of this Act as U.S. Department of Energy security inspectors from the physical fitness requirements promulgated by the Department of Energy for security inspectors, and from any other physical fitness requirements promulgated by the Secretary of Energy.

titles.title: A bill to exempt individuals currently employed as United States Department of Energy security inspectors from the physical fitness requirements promulgated by the Department of Energy in chapter IV of United States Department of Energy Order 5632 and from any other physical fitness requirements promulgated by the Department of Energy.
